page_content: The page focuses on media and informatics education in primary schools, offering various resources and training modules for teachers.
The page discusses the adjustments to the St. Gallen cantonal spatial planning guide, including various topics like public buildings, mobile communications, and wind energy.
The page offers information on biodiversity promotion in agriculture, including advice on new biodiversity elements and economic impacts.
The page provides various guidelines and documents for middle school teachers, including topics like group sizes, language of instruction, and software downloads.
The page provides information on various non-regulated further education courses and specializations in the field of informatics, including Data Scientist, ICT-Supporter, and Software Engineer.
The page announces an open day at the Agricultural Center SG, featuring various activities and exhibitions, including workshops and special shows on the theme of wood.
The page provides information on the legal requirements and procedures for acquiring real estate in the Canton of St. Gallen by persons residing abroad.
